text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)When a Zombie dies to it, it drops a Withered Marigold Pile on it's tile, amount depending on it's strength.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)Doom Rose really likes Doom, though doesn't have hands to rip and tear with so punching with rose buds will have to do.

pages.title: 🗡 Bruisers
pages.text: $(#25228d)Doom Roses flood the field with withering flowers.

pages.title: References
text: $(br2)$(#bd951a)Plants vs. Zombies: Battle For Neighborville: $()$(#ff0000)Doom Rose
